title: Oath of the Ancients
content:
in Baldur's Gate 3. Oath of the Ancients Paladin's primary Ability is Strength, their Saving Throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d10 per Paladin level. They have proficiency with Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons, and all Armor and Shields.

You fight on the side of light in the cosmic struggle against darkness to preserve the sanctity of life and the beauty of nature.
